tuv.seg:
Only a few mouse-clicks away lies a universe much unlike our own.
Powerful wizards roam the land and inhabit great castles. They summon dangerous creatures and send them off to battle it out with their rivals. A thriving economy forces the creation of new cities. Powerful, magically enhanced items are scattered throughout the world and can be used by your creatures.
Welcome to the world of Castle Quest.

If you don’t have a Castle Quest 2 account yet, click on the “New Account” button in the menu.
If you already have an account, log in using the form below.
